item.title: US Stock Crypto Reserve Concept Stocks Experience Widespread Decline, with Sharplink Falling by 6.29%
item.description: On August 14th, according to the market data of Rockflow, US stock cryptocurrency reserve concept stocks generally declined. This includes:· Sharplink Gaming decreased by 6.29%;· Bitmine dropped by 4.66%;· BTCS fell by 4.83%.· Strategy went down by 2.53%;· Circle increased by 1.55%;· Bullish rose by 4.93%.

item.title: PPI Higher Than Expected, US Stock Market's Three Major Indexes Open Lower
item.description: On August 14, at the opening of the US stock market, the three major indexes opened in a downward trend. The Dow fell by 0.34%, the S&P 500 dropped by 0.27%, and the Nasdaq decreased by 0.29%. (Golden Ten)

item.title: BtcTurk: Most of the assets are held in a secure cold wallet, and user funds are unaffected
item.description: On August 14th, BtcTurk declared that on August 14th, 2025, it noticed unusual activities in the hot wallet. As a security precaution, the platform has temporarily suspended cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals until the investigation is finished. The official statement pointed out that the majority of the assets are kept in a secure cold wallet, the company's financial status is strong, and user funds are not impacted. The functionalities of Turkish Lira deposits, withdrawals, and trading are operating normally. The platform has informed the regulatory authorities and has implemented all security measures.

item.title: A certain smart money has liquidated 2857 ETH, making a profit of $5.2 million.
item.description: August 14th. According to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a shrewd whale with the address 0x972...c1776 had previously exchanged 69.07 WBTC for 2881 ETH on July 9th. At that time, the price of ETH was $2601.14 (nearly the bottom of the subsequent upward trend). Ten minutes ago, the whale directly liquidated the remaining 2857 tokens on-chain (valued at approximately $12.64 million), ultimately achieving a profit of $5.2 million.

item.title: Coinbase has completed the acquisition of Deribit
item.description: On August 14th, Coinbase announced that it had successfully completed the acquisition of the cryptocurrency options exchange Deribit. Coinbase is now one step nearer to offering a comprehensive range of trading products, such as spot, futures, perpetual swaps, and options.By July 2025, the trading volume of Deribit had exceeded 185 billion dollars, and the current open interest on the platform reached approximately 60 billion dollars.

item.title: Metalpha withdrew 13,000 ETH from Aave and transferred it to Binance
item.description: August 14. According to on-chain analyst Yu Jin, 7 minutes ago, Metalpha withdrew 13,000 ETH (valued at $61.38 million) from Aave and subsequently transferred it to Binance.

item.title: AguilaTrades' $10 Million ETH Long Position Liquidated Again, Total Loss Reaches $37.5 Million
item.description: On August 14th, as monitored by on-chain analyst Yu Jin, AguilaTrades established a $10 million long position in ETH with the remaining $330,000 funds after undergoing liquidation. Ten minutes ago, it was liquidated again, resulting in an additional loss of $230,000. Subsequently, it continued to open a long position in ETH with the remaining $100,000 funds after liquidation, and the position was worth less than $3 million. Currently, it has lost $37.5 million on Hyperliquid.

item.title: Trump's Tariffs Impact Economy, U.S. Wholesale Prices Soar
item.description: August 14th: In the United States, wholesale prices witnessed a significant surge in July, with a year-on-year increase of 3.3%. This represents the most prominent indication thus far that President Trump's tariff policy is having an impact on the U.S. economy. The Producer Price Index (PPI) recorded its largest growth since February of this year. This index measures the prices that domestic producers receive for their goods and services. The data far exceeded the 2.4% year-on-year increase in June and the anticipated 2.5% increase projected by surveyed economists. After the release of the PPI report, both the two-year U.S. Treasury bond yield and the U.S. dollar, which are sensitive to interest rate expectations, showed an upward trend. (FX168)

item.title: Bernoth: Not Urging Fed Rate Cut, Just Citing Model Result
item.description: On August 14th, US Treasury Secretary Yellen stated that he is not demanding a series of interest rate cuts from the Fed. He merely pointed out that his model indicates that the "neutral" interest rate will be approximately 1.5 percentage points lower than it is currently. Yellen said: "I did not tell the Fed what to do." He was referring to his remarks the previous day regarding the Fed "being capable of initiating a series of rate cuts."Yellen stated on Thursday: "What I said is that in order to reach the neutral rate, it would necessitate a rate cut of about 150 basis points. If you believe in the existence of the neutral rate, I think there is room for a series of rate cuts. However, I am not calling for a rate cut. I do not make such a call. I merely stated that the model calculates the neutral rate to be approximately 150 basis points lower than the current level." (FXStreet)

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen over $1 billion in liquidations, with $565 million liquidated in just under 1 hour.
item.description: On August 14th, within the past 24 hours, a combined total of $10.39 billion was liquidated across the entire network. Among them, $7.7 billion was in long liquidations and $2.69 billion was in short liquidations. In the last hour alone, $5.65 billion was liquidated.During the past 24 hours, a total of 218,017 individuals were liquidated globally. The largest single liquidation took place on Bybit - BTCUSD, with a value of $10 million.
